item.title: How to type emoji in one keystroke on a Mac
item.description:
It's easy to create keyboard shortcuts on macOS without using 3rd party apps (like Karabiner) or Text Replacement (which doesn't work in Chrome). Here's how to do it.
You'll need to edit this Key Binding dict:
$ vi ~/Library/KeyBindings/DefaultKeyBinding.dict
Here's my DefaultKeyBinding.di

item.title: AutoMapper 13.0 Released
item.description:
Today I pushed out AutoMapper 13.0 (is that too many...?):
* Release Notes * Changelog * NuGet * Upgrade Guide
Probably the biggest change with this release is folding in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection support directly. The AutoMapper.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection package is deprecated as a result.
Side note, the docs were messed up
